articles.title: Anchorage’s OCC Charter Won’t Change Wyoming Plans for Kraken, Avanti - Decrypt
articles.description: The OCC trust charter to Anchorage won't change the strategy for Kraken or Avanti, both of which have Wyoming bank licenses.
articles.content:
In brief
  • Digital asset custodian Anchorage received an OCC trust charter.
  • Kraken and Avanti have received Wyoming bank charters to become special purpose depository institutions.

articles.author: Mike Rogoway | The Oregonian/OregonLive
articles.title: Intel suggests it will wait for new CEO to make critical decisions to fix manufacturing crisis - OregonLive
articles.description: The company must decide whether to admit technical defeat and outsource its leading-edge chips to rival manufacturers in Asia.
articles.content: Intel told employees Thursday it may postpone a decision on how to fix its manufacturing crisis, likely waiting for new CEO Pat Gelsinger to join the company next month before deciding whether to out… [+11963 chars]

articles.description: Petco is hoping the third time is the charm.
